text: Guido Wilhelmus Imbens (born September 3, 1963) is a Dutch-American economist. He is Professor of Economics at the Stanford Graduate School of Business. He taught at Harvard University, UCLA, and UC Berkeley.Guido Imbens He was the editor of Econometrica beginning in 2019. Imbens was awarded half of the 2021 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences with Joshua Angrist "for their works to the analysis of causal relationships", with David Card awarded the other half.The Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel 2021 ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Dutch economists Category:American economists Category:People from Eindhoven
title: Guido Imbens
